mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(ID, USER_ID, PW, NAME, EMAIL, PROFILE_NAME, PROFILE_TEXT, PROFILE_IMAGE) VALUES (#{id}, #{user_id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{profile_name}, #{profile_text}, #{profile_image})
mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, user_id, email, name, profile_name, profile_text, profile_image, created_at, email FROM member WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET USER_ID = #{user_id}, PW = #{pw}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PROFILE_NAME = #{profile_name}, PROFILE_TEXT = #{profile_text}, PROFILE_IMAGE = #{profile_image} WHERE ID = #{id}
